library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)
source("common2.R")
################################################################
######################## USER INTERFACE ########################
################################################################
ui <- 
  fluidPage( 
    #Set up tabs
    titlePanel("Cool Application"),
    
    sidebarLayout("",
      mainPanel(width = 12,
        tabsetPanel(
     ###########################
     ####### SCATTERPLOT #######
     ###########################
          tabPanel("Scatterplot", 
                   br(),
                   fluidRow(
                   ##############################################
                   ######## USER CONTROL PANEL (SIDEBAR) ########
                   ##############################################
                     column(3,
                          wellPanel(
                        #labels for data selection options
                          fluidRow(   column(2),   column(5, "x-axis"),   column(5, "y-axis")   ),
                        #row to select data types to view (such as RNAseq or DNA copy number)
                          fluidRow(
                            column(2, "Data"),
                        #input to select which data type is displayed on the x-axis
                          column(5,
                                  selectInput("datatype_x", NULL,c("DNA Copy Number"))
                                ),
                        #input to select which data type is displayed on the y-axis
                          column(5,
                                  selectInput("datatype_y", NULL, c("DNA Copy Number"))
                                )
                              ),
                        #row to select which gene to view
                          fluidRow(
                            column(2,"Gene"),
                        #input to select which gene is displayed on the x-axis
                          column(5,
                            selectInput("gene_x", NULL,
                                        c("A1BG" = "A1BG",
                                          "---" = " ",
                                          "CDH2" = "CDH2"
                                          ))
                                        ),
                        #input to select which gene is displayed on the y-axis
                          column(5,
                            selectInput("gene_y", NULL,
                                        c("CDH2" = "CDH2",
                                          "---" = " ",
                                          "A1BG" = "A1BG"
                                          )))
                                          )
                                        ),
                            br(),
                                          "Select a cancer type to highlight",
                            selectInput("variable", NULL,
                                        c("Cancer1" = "cancer1",
                                          "Cancer2" = "cancer2",
                                          "Cancer3" = "cancer3")),
                            checkboxInput("showSelected", "Show selected cancers only?", FALSE)
                                        ),
                   ##################################################
                   ######## INFORMATION DISPLAY (MAIN PANEL) ########
                   ##################################################
                     column(9,
                            ##############################################################
                            ######## POINT DETAIL DISPLAY (Cell line, Cancer Type) #######
                            ##############################################################
                            fluidRow(
                              #display details of the left plot ("zoomed-out" plot)
                              column(6, 
                                     #display details
                                     fluidRow(column(1),
                                              column(10,
                                                     wellPanel(uiOutput("cell_details")))
                                              )
                                     ),
                              #display details of the right plot ("zoomed-in" plot)
                              column(6,
                                     #only display IF the user has selected a potion of the left plot
                                     conditionalPanel(condition = 'output.brushActive != 0',
                                       fluidRow(column(1),
                                                column(10,
                                                     wellPanel(uiOutput("cell_zoom_details")))
                                              )
                                       )
                                     )
                            ),
                            #############################################
                            ######## POINT DETAIL DISPLAY (Other) #######
                            #############################################                            
                            fluidRow(
                              column(6,
                                     fluidRow(column(1),
                                              column(10,
                                                     wellPanel(verbatimTextOutput("click_info")))
                                              )
                                     ),
                              column(6,
                                     conditionalPanel(condition = 'output.brushActive != 0',
                                     fluidRow(column(1),
                                                 column(10,
                                                     wellPanel(verbatimTextOutput("zoom_click_info"))
                                                     )
                                              )
                                     )
                                     )
                            ),
                            #####################################
                            ######## SCATTERPLOT DISPLAY ########
                            #####################################
                            fluidRow(
                              #Display left ("zoomed-out") scatterplot
                              column(6,
                                     wellPanel(
                                                plotOutput("plot",
                                                           click = "plot_click",
                                                           brush = brushOpts(id="plot_brush")
                                                           )
                                                )
                                     ),
                              #Display right ("zoomed-in") scatterplot
                              column(6,
                                     #only display IF the user has selected a potion of the left plot
                                     conditionalPanel(condition = 'output.brushActive != 0',
                                                      wellPanel(
                                                       plotOutput("plot_zoom",
                                                                  click = "plot_zoom_click"))
                                                      )
                                     )
                              )
                            )
                   )
                  ),
     #######################
     ####### HEATMAP #######
     #######################   
          tabPanel("Heatmap", verbatimTextOutput("summary"))
        )
      )
    )
  )
########################################################
######################## SERVER ########################
########################################################
server <- function(input, output) {
    
  #BEGIN TEST VALUES
    x <- rnorm(500)
    y <- rnorm(500)
    testdata <- data.frame(x = x, y = y)
    plotdata <- reactiveValues(zoomdata=testdata)
  #END TEST VALUES
    cbPalette <- c("#999999", "#E69F00", "#56B4E9", "#009E73", "#F0E442", "#0072B2", "#D55E00", "#CC79A7")
    ptBig = 4
    ptMed = 2
    transp = 0.3
    colRed = cbPalette[7]
    colOrn = cbPalette[2]
    colLtBlu = cbPalette[3]
    
    inputdata_x <- readRDS("CCLE_copynumber_byGene_2013-12-03")
    inputdata_y <- inputdata_x 
    pnt <- NULL
    pnt_zoom <- NULL

  ###################################
  ######## CHECK EVENT FLAGS ########
  ###################################
    #values for event flags
    flags <- reactiveValues(brushActive = 0)
    output$brushActive <- reactive({ return(flags$brushActive) })
    outputOptions(output, name = "brushActive", suspendWhenHidden = FALSE)
    
    #Check to see if the brush is active
    observeEvent(plotdata$zoomdata, {
     if(is.data.frame(plotdata$zoomdata) && nrow(plotdata$zoomdata)==0) {
        flags$brushActive <- 0
        print("brush is not active")
     }
      else{
        flags$brushActive <- 1
        print("brush is active!")
      }
    })
    #If the user has selected data points with the brush, save them to the reactiveValue "zoomdata"
    observeEvent(input$plot_brush,{plotdata$zoomdata <- brushedPoints(testdata,input$plot_brush)})
  
  ##################################
  ####### RENDERING OUTPUTS ########
  ##################################
    
    #output the left/"zoomed-out" plot
    output$plot<- renderPlot({ 
      x_sel <<- input$gene_x
      y_sel <<- input$gene_y
      #Select the appropriate rows from our database table based on user input
      if(x_sel != " " && y_sel != " "){
        #Get the x and y values of interest and save them to a data frame
        x <- sapply(inputdata_x[inputdata_x[,"SYMBOL"]==x_sel,-c(1:5)], as.numeric)
        y <- sapply(inputdata_y[inputdata_y[,"SYMBOL"]==y_sel,-c(1:5)], as.numeric)
        defaultplotdata <<- data.frame(x = x, y = y)
        
        #Create our plot
        defaultplot <<- ggplot() + geom_point(data = defaultplotdata, aes(x,y), alpha=transp, color=colLtBlu) + labs(x = x_sel, y = y_sel, title = "Test Scatter") 
        if(!is.null(pnt_zoom)){
            defaultplot <<- defaultplot + geom_point(data = pnt_zoom, aes(x,y), color=colOrn, size = ptMed) 
          }
        if(is.null(input$plot_zoom_click)){
          #If a point was selected, highlight it with a solid red dot
          if(!is.null(pnt_zoom)){
            defaultplot + geom_point(data = pnt_zoom, aes(x,y), color=colOrn, size = ptMed) 
          }
          #if no point was selected, print the graph without a highlighted point
          else{ defaultplot }
        }
        #If there is a mouse click, update the saved point with the new point and print it to the graph
        else{
          defaultplot + geom_point(data = pnt_zoom, aes(x,y), color=colOrn, size = ptMed) 
        }
      #If the user has selected a point, highlight it on the scatterplot
        #If there is no mouse click, continue printing out the same graph as previously 
          #(Prevent the highlighted point from flickering in and out of existence between clicks)
        if(is.null(input$plot_click)){
          #If a point was selected, highlight it with a solid red dot
          if(!is.null(pnt)){
            defaultplot + geom_point(data = pnt, aes(x,y), color=colRed, size = ptBig, shape = 17) 
          }
          #if no point was selected, print the graph without a highlighted point
          else{
            defaultplot
          }
        }
        #If there is a mouse click, update the saved point with the new point and print it to the graph
        else{
          pnt <<- nearPoints(defaultplotdata, input$plot_click, maxpoints = 1)
          defaultplot + geom_point(data = pnt, aes(x,y), color=colRed, size = ptBig, shape = 17) 
        }
      }
    }) 
    
    output$cell_details <- renderUI({
      if(!is.null(input$plot_click)){}
      printInfo(pnt)
    })
    
    #output data associated with the selected point on the left/"zoomed-out" plot
    output$click_info <- renderPrint({
      if(!is.null(input$plot_click)){}
      printPoint(pnt)
    })
    
    
    #output the right/"zoomed-in" plot
    output$plot_zoom<- renderPlot({ 
      print("zoom")
      plotdata$zoomdata <- brushedPoints(defaultplotdata,input$plot_brush)
      zoomplot<<-ggplot(plotdata$zoomdata, aes(x,y)) + geom_point(alpha=transp, color=colLtBlu) + geom_point(data = pnt, aes(x,y), color=colRed, size = ptMed) 
      
      #Allow for point that was selected on hte "zoomed-out" plot to appear in the "zoomed-in" plot
      if(is.null(input$plot_click)){
          #If a point was selected, highlight it with a solid red dot
          if(!is.null(pnt)){
            zoomplot + geom_point(data = pnt, aes(x,y), color=colRed, size = ptMed) 
          }
          #if no point was selected, print the graph without a highlighted point
          else{ zoomplot }
        }
        #If there is a mouse click, update the saved point with the new point and print it to the graph
        else{
          zoomplot + geom_point(data = pnt, aes(x,y), color=colRed, size = ptMed) 
        }
      
       #If the user has selected a point on the "zoomed-in" plot, highlight it on the scatterplot
        #If there is no mouse click, continue printing out the same graph as previously 
          #(Prevent the highlighted point from flickering in and out of existence between clicks)
        if(is.null(input$plot_zoom_click)){
          #If a point was selected, highlight it with a solid red dot
          if(!is.null(pnt_zoom)){
            zoomplot + geom_point(data = pnt_zoom, aes(x,y), color=colOrn, size = ptBig, shape = 17) 
          }
          #if no point was selected, print the graph without a highlighted point
          else{ zoomplot }
        }
        #If there is a mouse click, update the saved point with the new point and print it to the graph
        else{
          pnt_zoom <<- nearPoints(defaultplotdata, input$plot_zoom_click, maxpoints = 1)
          zoomplot + geom_point(data = pnt_zoom, aes(x,y), color=colOrn, size = ptBig, shape = 17) 
        }
    }) 
    
    output$cell_zoom_details <- renderUI({
      if(!is.null(input$plot_zoom_click)){}
      printInfo(pnt_zoom)
    })    
    
    #output data associated with the selected point on the right/"zoomed-in" plot
    output$zoom_click_info <- renderPrint({
      if(!is.null(input$plot_zoom_click)){
        #pnt <- nearPoints(defaultplotdata, input$plot_zoom_click, maxpoints = 1)
      }
      printPoint(pnt_zoom)
    })
  
  #################################
  ######## VARIOUS FUNTIONS #######
  #################################
    printInfo <- function(point){
      underscore <- regexpr("_",rownames(point))
      cell_line <- substring(rownames(point), 1, underscore-1)
      cancer_type <- substring(rownames(point), underscore+1)
      str1 <- paste("Cell Line:  ",cell_line)
      str2 <-paste("Cancer Type:  ", cancer_type)
      HTML(paste(str1,str2,sep='<br/>'))
    }
    printPoint <- function(point){
      print(paste(x_sel, ": ",point$x))
      print(paste(y_sel, ": ",point$y))
    }

}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
